morphInfos.tenseExplained: it was happening in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person speaking or writing
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was happening to or for people or things that are speaking or writing
